S

saveboard() - Method in class model.MinesweeperBoard
This public method saves the board object into save_game.dat With use of serialization and file/ObjectOutputStream, this object is able to be encoded into the dat file and saved inside our project.
saveBoard() - Method in class model.MinesweeperModel
This public method calls the saveboard() method on the underlying MinesweeperBoard object.
savedGameInfo - Variable in class MinesweeperView
 
saveHighScores(int) - Method in class model.MinesweeperBoard
This public method saves the given time to the high scores save file.
saveHighScores(int) - Method in class model.MinesweeperModel
This public method calls the saveHighScores() method on the underlying MinesweeperBoard object.
scoreInfo - Variable in class model.MinesweeperBoard
 
seconds - Variable in class MinesweeperView
 
seconds - Variable in class model.MinesweeperModel
 
selectDiff(Stage) - Method in class MinesweeperView
This private method changes the stage to display three difficulty options: easy, medium, and hard.
selectSize(Stage) - Method in class MinesweeperView
This private method changes the stage to display three size options: small, medium, and large.
sendUpdate() - Method in class model.MinesweeperModel
This public method wraps setChanged and notifyObservers into one method call to simplify updating the view.
setBoardSize(int, int) - Method in class controller.MinesweeperController
 
setTime(int) - Method in class model.MinesweeperBoard
This public method is a setter for the time field
setTime(int) - Method in class model.MinesweeperModel
This public method is the setter for the seconds field.
showScoreBoard() - Method in class MinesweeperView
This private method displays a new Alert window with high scores.
size - Variable in class MinesweeperView
 
stage - Variable in class MinesweeperView
 
start(Stage) - Method in class MinesweeperView
This method controls the GUI View (in MVC) for the Minesweeper program.
stopped - Variable in class MinesweeperView
